title: Basin Hopping YAML Config
description: YAML config autocompletion for the basin hopping algorithm

radius.description: Radius of the sphere the initial atoms configuration is uniformly distributed in

max_radius.description: The maximum radius of the cube to constrain the atoms in. If not set, no constraint is placed on the atoms

max_steps.description: The maximum number of steps the algorithm will take

stop_steps.description: The number of steps, without there being a new minimum, the algorithm will take before stopping. If not set, the algorithm will run for the maximum number of steps

temperature.description: The temperature parameter for the Metropolis acceptance criterion

step_size.description: The initial value of the step size

step_size_factor.description: The factor to multiply and divide the step size by

step_size_interval.description: The interval for how often to update the step size

filter_type.description:
Filter the found local minima
 null : no filter
 s : significant figures filter
 d : difference filter

significant_figures.description: Significant figures to round the potential energy to to check for uniqueness

database.description: Database file for storing global minima

trajectory.description: Trajectory file for storing local minima

filtered_trajectory.description: Trajectory file for storing filtered local minima. If null, filtered local minima are stored in the original
